senses.sense_definition: Any of various grasses with fine, hair-like stems or leaves, such as those in the genera Aira or Deschampsia.

examples.text: The meadow was covered in clumps of tufted <w>hairgrass</w> swaying in the wind.
Botanists identified the species as silver <w>hairgrass</w> due to its delicate texture.

senses.sense_definition: A type of sedge belonging to the genus Eleocharis, often used in aquariums.

examples.text: Aquascapers often use dwarf <w>hairgrass</w> to create a lush green carpet in the tank.
The <w>hairgrass</w> requires strong lighting and carbon dioxide to thrive underwater.
